review: Purchased this for my neighbor because he likes to chromecast from his laptop to the tv in his livingroom. Now he can do the same with the one on his porch without having to move it from one tv to the other.
author: Ray

review: So far no complaints, runs netflix  just fine.,
author: Jennifer

review: Works great see all videos on YouTube straight on my tv
author: phillip

review: Works great, easy to install, adds a lot of entertainment to my home tv at a very low cost. Works with my android phones and tablets and my iPad mini.
author: Walter Wright Jr.

review: AppleTV is vastly better. Has trouble connecting often
author: Brady S. Vallala

review: Recommend to everyone. Great functionality and is due for upgrades and improvements. Great value.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love this thing! I was going away on vacation while season four of Game of Thrones was airing, and I was NOT going to miss an episode. Bought this, used HBO GO, and zig! didn't miss it and watched it in real time. Worth every penny. No glitches, easy set up. We use it here at home, too. Great invention!
author: G. Uhl "Allons-y, ... and don't blink."

review: I expected better, I prefer the apple tv
author: Emiro Zambrano
